meta.name: Scrabble
meta.description: Scrabble is a captivating, fast-paced take on the global board-game phenomenon. In each episode, wordsmiths battle it out playing a series of addictive, word-based games to win points and add words to a giant SCRABBLE board in the center of the set.

videos.title: Scrabble Fashionista
videos.overview: A lettered bow tie wearing Scrabble enthusiast engages in a word battle in the hopes of winning $10,000.

videos.title: Let's Get Ready to Scrabble
videos.overview: A wrestling announcer battles it out in the Scrabble squared circle, looking to create the best words and take home the lettered belt and $10,000.

videos.title: Word Wizards
videos.overview: Hosted by Raven-Symoné, contestants face off in an engaging war of words in the hopes of walking away with $10,000.

videos.title: "T" Is For Tap Dancing
videos.overview: Hosted by Raven-Symoné, a former dancer looks to find the right letter tiles and bonus squares to tap dance towards $10,000.

videos.title: Scabbleiscious
videos.overview: Hosted by Raven-Symoné, contestants engage in some tasty wordplay in the hopes of creating the right words and taking home $10,000.

videos.title: Dictionary Divas
videos.overview: Hosted by Raven-Symoné, word lovers do battle placing their letter tiles on the supersized Scrabble board in the hopes of taking home the $10,000 prize.

videos.title: Word Warriors
videos.overview: Hosted by Raven-Symoné, contestants rearrange their letter tiles to find the right words in their effort to take home the $10,000 prize.

videos.title: Human Dictionary
videos.overview: "The Cheetah Girls", players compete to place their words on the right bonus squares in their pursuit of the $10,000 prize.

videos.title: Vowel Play
videos.overview: Hosted by Raven-Symoné, players compete to place their words on the right bonus squares in their pursuit of the $10,000 prize.

videos.title: Get Wordy With It
videos.overview: Hosted by Raven-Symoné, players face off looking to find the best words on their letter tile racks in pursuit of $10,000.

videos.title: Letterheads
videos.overview: Hosted by Raven-Symoné ("That's So Raven," "The Cheetah Girls"), letter tile titans compete to put the best words up on the supersized game board in hopes of going home with $10,000.
